root: ^Following the safari incident, the VIPs are on-edge, they stay in their rooms longer in the morning, and turn in earlier, quietly taking the stronger alcohol with them. A silence has descended over their lounge, but no one makes a move to leave yet, and no one wants to talk about what happened.

^This fear though is still secondary to the flight itinerary. You pick up the next batch of corporate elites for the final stretch to the resort. These newbloods quickly lift the mood of your passengers, but it never quite reaches the fever pitch it started at. You're going to need to be very careful about your next few steps.
